competencies.name: Orientation and Behaviour in Media Environments
competencies.focus: Pupils can orient themselves in physical, media and virtual environments and behave in accordance with laws, rules and values.

competencies.name: Media Decoding and Reflection
competencies.focus: Pupils can interpret, reflect on and use media and media contributions.

competencies.name: Media Production and Publishing
competencies.focus: Pupils can transform ideas, opinions, experiences and knowledge into media contributions and publish them, considering laws, rules, and values.

competencies.name: Communicate and Cooperate Using Media
competencies.focus: Pupils can use media interactively and communicate and collaborate with others.

competencies.name: Structuring, Organising and Analysing Data
competencies.focus: Pupils can represent, organise and evaluate data from their environment.

competencies.name: Problem Solving and Programming
competencies.focus: Pupils can analyse simple problems, describe possible solutions and implement them in programs.

competencies.name: Information Systems and Security
competencies.focus: Pupils understand the structure and function of information processing systems and can apply data security concepts.
